resources.string: Password has been locked, please contact customer service to unlock
Verification code error, please confirm and try again
Please enter your phone number to reset your login password
Please enter your email to reset your password and complete login
Email verification code has been sent to:
The phone number is invalid or already in use
The re-entered password does not match
The new password cannot be the same as the current password

Account ID card number is not case-sensitive. If it is a Hong Kong ID card, no need to enter brackets. 
Examples are as follows: 
Hong Kong ID card: G1234567 
Mainland ID card: 12345678901234123X 
Mainland Passport: E12345678
The login password must contain at least three of the following: uppercase letters, lowercase letters, numbers, or punctuation marks
Must contain at least three of the following: uppercase letters, lowercase letters, numbers, or punctuation
Your information is incomplete and cannot proceed to the next step
Please remember your new login password
Your login password has been changed, please log in again
You have not set a password yet, please set a password first
Are you sure you want to log out?
You can turn off auto-login if needed.
Account ID card number verification failed, please check if the input is correct
8-20 characters, must include at least 3 of uppercase letters, lowercase letters, numbers, and punctuation marks
To ensure account security, you must set a login password on your first login

The login password is the password you use to log in to the Star Wealth APP, and it is only used for logging into the Star Wealth APP \n\nThe transaction password is the password you use to handle Fosun International Securities business through the trading account. This password can be used to unlock transactions, submit orders, and perform securities trading-related actions within the Star Wealth APP, and can also be used to log in to other trading platforms of Fosun International Securities
The current phone number is bound to multiple trading accounts
To ensure the security of your account, this phone number does not support account password login for now. Please choose SMS verification code login
Go to SMS Verification Code Login
To protect your account security, corporate accounts do not support online modification of the verified phone number. If you need to modify it, please contact online customer service
To protect your account security, corporate accounts do not support online modification of the verified email. If you need to modify it, please contact online customer service
The current account type does not support this function
To ensure account security, the first login to Star Wealth must use SMS verification code login and set a login password
